original_text: Many people heard how the Lord had caused the Jordan River to become dry. This included all the Amorite kings on the west side of the Jordan River, and all the Canaanite kings who lived near the sea. They heard how the Lord had made the river become dry until all the Israelites had crossed to the other side. So the kings became very afraid of the Israelite people. They felt too weak to fight against them.
korean_text: 요단 서쪽의 아모리 사람의 모든 왕들과 해변의 가나안 사람의 모든 왕들이 여호와께서 요단 물을 이스라엘 자손들 앞에서 말리시고 우리를 건너게 하셨음을 듣고 마음이 녹았고 이스라엘 자손들 때문에 정신을 잃었더라

sentences.original_text: Many people heard how the Lord had caused the Jordan River to become dry
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 주님께서 요단강을 마르게 하셨다는 소문을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: This included all the Amorite kings on the west side of the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 여기에는 요단강 서쪽에 있는 모든 아모리 왕들이 포함되었습니다

sentences.original_text: and all the Canaanite kings who lived near the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바닷가 근처에 사는 모든 가나안 왕들도 포함되었습니다

sentences.original_text: They heard how the Lord had made the river become dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님께서 강을 마르게 하셨다는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: until all the Israelites had crossed to the other side
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 반대편으로 건널 때까지

sentences.original_text: So the kings became very afraid of the Israelite people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왕들은 이스라엘 백성을 매우 두려워하게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: They felt too weak to fight against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들과 싸우기에 너무 약하다고 느꼈습니다
